info.name: Google Minus
info.description: A truly minimalist Google style. The bare functional minimum: just the search bar. No distractions, colors or widgets. This is what "simple" actually means.
info.additionalInfo:
This style removes every element from the Google homepage except for the search bar. 
Elements removed include:
The logo
The header bar
The footer bar
The Google+, Gmail, and Images options in the upper right
The Google Apps and Google+ Notifications widgets
The Google Profile icon
The search buttons
The "Say "Ok Google"" text
The microphone icon
And any holiday icons
You can still press enter to search, of course, and search result page functionality is unimpaired.
